paper_metadata.title: Improving the performance of low-productivity smallholder farmers is a pathway with great potential for reducing poverty and enhancing food security and nutrition in sub-Saharan Africa

component_b_assets.assets_evidence_citation: Kingbird seeds were made available for farmers to purchase from farmers' cooperatives

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: We examine the impact of advisory services and technology channeling on farm yields and efficiency
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: We randomly selected 96 villages from these districts, which were then randomly assigned into treated and control groups

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: We examine the impact of advisory services and technology channeling on farm yields and efficiency
evidence_citations.country_citation: We used a multistage sampling approach to select the study area and farming households. First, we purposely selected four adjacent major wheat-growing districts in the Amhara region of Ethiopia
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: Using experimental data from Ethiopia and a mediated stochastic frontier model that accounts for endogenous treatment status, we examine the impact of advisory services and technology channeling on farm yields and efficiency
